name: Van Life
description:
Embrace Van Life!

Trade with goods, travel the countryside and upgrade your vehicle.

Van Life is all about you and your van. Visit various traders on the map and see what they have to offer. You can earn some coin by exchanging food, batteries and fuel. Don’t forget to rest every once in awhile and keep enhancing your ride. The bigger and better equipped your van is, the more goods you can transport.

Music credits: Beat Provided By https://freebeats.io Produced By White Hot
